project2.title: The To-Do List
project2.description: Ever forget your to-do list and then miss some of the things you meant to do? Now you don't have to with the To-Do List! Write down all your chores/tasks and edit, delete or add them!
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, SCSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, Webpack/esLint, Firebase, GitBash

project5.title: Pathetic Connect
project5.description: Losers need love too. Have you been rejected several times and don't know where to go? At Pathetic Connect, you can communicate with others who have experienced the same thing, share articles, create events to get together in and chat. Make friends today!
project5.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, SCSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, Webpack/esLint, Firebase, GitBash **My part included the Articles section, styling and header.
